note.title: Important
note.author: John
note.content: This is a note about a very important project. It involves a lot of complex details and many different tasks. We need to make sure we get it right.

note.title: Reminder
note.author: Jane
note.content: Don't forget to pick up milk on the way home. It's a crucial item for our dinner plans.

note.title: Meeting
note.author: Bob
note.content: We need to discuss the project timeline and make some adjustments. It's going to be a challenging conversation.
